channel.title: How to add item command for 508?
channel.description: Blah im so used to the old ones but how do you add an item command to a 508 server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 06:00:53 pm[/size][hr]OK???

item.title: How to add item command for 508?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“glabay, post:2, topic:233016”] } else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

put that in commands.java[/quote]
